HediffDef.label: storing bendalloy
HediffDef.description: This pawn is storing nutrition in a bendalloy metalmind. Their metabolism speeds up dramatically, burning through food reserves at an accelerated rate. They become hungry faster and must eat more to maintain energy — but the nutrition is preserved for future emergencies.

HediffDef.label: tapping bendalloy
HediffDef.description: This pawn is tapping a bendalloy metalmind, sustaining themselves on stored nutrition. They require little to no food while tapping, allowing them to survive starvation, long marches, or resource-scarce environments with ease.
